channel.title: 24 UK Podcast
channel.description:
The 24 UK Podcast is growing faster than a terrorist cell, now featuring EXCLUSIVE CAST MEMBER interviews, with the likes of Carlos Bernard (Tony Almeida), James Morrison (Bill Buchanan), Gregory Itzin (Charles Logan), Jayne Atkinson (Karen Hayes), Jean Smart (Martha Logan) and Carlo Rota (Morris O’Brian)... plus there’s more to come!

All that plus a weekly round up of our favourite moments, line of the hour and Jack’s kill count. Not just for the UK, we are the Internationally recognised home of 24 in audio!

All of that garnished with a vocal salad of Guy Harris, the 24 UK voiceoverguy.

Be sure to check out our new WEBSITE and FORUM - www.24ukpodcast.net and EMAIL US on info@24ukpodcast.net . If you don’t we’ll send round Jack and Tony to neutralise you.

item.title: DVD Video Trailer 24 UK Podcast Behind the Scenes: The Chronicles of Los Angeles.
item.description:
The Video Trailer for the DVD 24 UK Podcast Behind the Scenes: The Chronicles of Los Angeles. Buy it now only £9.99

www.24ukpodcast.net
item.itunes:subtitle: The Video Trailer for the DVD 24 UK Podcast Behind the Scenes: The Chronicles of Los Angeles. Buy it now only £9.99 www.24ukpodcast.net
item.itunes:summary: The Video Trailer for the DVD 24 UK Podcast Behind the Scenes: The Chronicles of Los Angeles. Buy it now only £9.99 www.24ukpodcast.net

item.title: Buy the DVD 24 UK Podcast Behind the Scenes: The Chronicles Of Los Angeles
item.description:
The long awaited 24 UK Podcast DVD is finally here. An Action packed 2 Disc Dual Layer DVD! Featuring everything you didn't see on youtube, and everything you did! Listen to the latest podcast about the DVD by click here.

On Disc 1 you will find all of our interviews from our time in LA, plus all the unseen footage of our interview with Carlos Barbosa (production designer).

Disc 2: The video diaries, Trig & Jamie recorded video diaries throughout their time in LA, covering everything from the flight, pre & post interviews, tracking down the Hollywood sign, and the undercover op to track down 24 ON Location!

On Location with 24! Watch how Trig & Jamie tracked down 24 On Location and how they breached security to meet the production team, featuring 2 interviews, filming of a car chase & Trig & Jamie's on screen debut!

The Outtakes, even with a high budget professional setup there are always technical glitches all of which were caught on camera! 

Cribs, you will have heard on the podcast that Trig & Jamie shared an apartment with someone called Joe, watch what they discover when Joe is out and they record their very own version of Cribs!

The Set Tour on the big-screen! Watch Carlos Barbosa guide Trig & Jamie around the sets of 24!

And much much more! Buy it now for £9.99, Only available for UK residents!

item.title: Carlo Rota (Morris O’Brian) Interview (Part 4) In LA
item.description:
Our final exclusive video interview with Carlo Rota who played Morris O’Brian in 24 is now also available in HD on our youtube feed.

Carlo chats all about the on-goings on 24 including some interesting off screen stories! Plus much more including the 24 drink review.

Special thanks to Alex Kundsen of Gantry Productions for editing this interview!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Youtube)

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Season 8 Review Podcast (Live)
item.description:
Trig & Jamie broadcast live their review of Season 8!

Joined live by listeners around the world, listen to Trig & Jamie's Top 10 Moments of the Season, Jack's Top 10 Kills, Top 10 Lines of the Season! & The final Conspiracy Theories!

Trig & Jamie also chat about their favourite moments recording the 24 UK Podcast & reveal the winners of Jack's Kill Count & Line of the Hour!

www.24ukpodcast.net

www.ustream.tv/channel/24-uk-podcast (Ustream)

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Youtube)

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Season 8 Episode 23 & 24 2pm - 4pm
item.description:
In the final review podcast Trig & Jamie make 24 UK Podcast history by broadcasting live! Joined by many listeners on Sunday evening they gave Trig & Jamie instant feedback to their thoughts on the headlines, lines of the hour & much more!

The final Headlines, the final Kill Count, the final Line of the Hour, the final Conspiracy Theories! Enjoy & tune in live next week for our Season Review podcast!

www.24ukpodcast.net


www.ustream.tv/channel/24-uk-podcast (Ustream)

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Youtube)

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: 24 UK Podcast Set Tour: Parts 1-4
item.description:
Watch the most thorough and complete tour of the 24 Sets you are ever likely to see! The 24 UK Podcast Set Tour has arrived to coincide with the Season Finale (UK), Watch as you are joined by Carlos Barbosa (Production Designer) and Trig & Jamie for a guided tour around the 24 sets. (HD version is available on our youtube page!
They explore CTU during filming where you see everything including the main floor, the 24 foot screen, Hastings & Chloe's office, the sever room & more! Carlos then guides Trig & Jamie around his impressive recreation of the United Nations, you will see the Council Chamber, the interpreter booths, President Taylor's office, President Hassan's office, Logan's office, & even the Berlin wall!
During this unprecedented tour you will also get to see what lies behind the sets as Carlos reveals all to Trig & Jamie, this is a completely unique set tour where you will see never before seen footage of Carlos & the 24 sets, all exclusive to the 24 UK Podcast!
A big thanks to Carlos Barbosa for giving up his time & going out of his way to help make this set tour possible. We would also like to thank Alex Knudsen of Gantry Productions for his amazing work editing the set tour together, Nawaz Alamgir for the incredible graphics created especially for this set tour & our sponsor Blue Microphones! We hope you enjoy the 24 UK Podcast's Set Tour!
www.24ukpodcast.net
@24UKPodcast (Twitter)
24UKPodcast (Youtube)
sponsored by Blue Microphones

item.title: Season 8 Episode 21 & 22 12pm - 2pm
item.description:
With only 2 hours left until 24 ends after 8 seasons, Trig & Jamie discuss the awesomeness of episodes 21 & 22!

We break down the episodes into as many pieces as bits of Pavel left on the floor! Headlines, Kill Count, Line of the Hour, the final Conspiracy Theories, Torture, and probably most importantly where we think 24 will finally end!

Plus we have news on our set tour, video interviews & an exclusive season review with Jon Cassar!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Season 8 Episode 19 & 20 10am - 12pm
item.description:
After a few technical glitches the 24 UK Podcast is back for a double episode covering episodes 19 & 20!

With only 4 episodes left Trig & Jamie discuss their theories & thoughts on where the show will end.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Ben Jones Interview
item.description:
Trig & Jamie interview Radio DJ, Celebrity interviewer & self confessed 24 addict Ben Jones. Ben contacted us & was then invited on the show to talk about 24 and his interview with Kiefer Sutherland!

Trig & Jamie test Ben’s 24 knowledge, share set visit stories, discuss cast relationships & even find time to talk about porn!

You can listen to Ben's interview with Kiefer through the Sky 1 website.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (twitter)

24UKPodcast (Youtube)

item.title: Season 8 Episode 18 9am - 10am
item.description:
Join Trig & Jamie as they discuss the latest hour in Jack Bauer's day! This week we make 24 UK Podcast history with Jamie writing headlines & a very first in Line of the Hour.

All that plus latest interview news & much more!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Marci Michelle Interview Part 2
item.description:
Trig & Jamie bring you part 2 of their exclusive interview with Marci Michelle dialogue advisor on 24. In Part 2 Marci talks about Annie Wersching, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Kiefer Sutherland & many more!

Marci also chats about her thoughts on the end of 24, what we can expect from the final episodes, the feature film and her most memorable moment!

Do not miss this insightful interview!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (twitter)

24UKPodcast (Youtube)

item.title: Rodney Charters Interview Part 2
item.description:
Part 2 of our exclusive interview with Rodney Charters Director of Photography on 24. Rodney talks about the very beginning of 24, working with Stephen Hopkins and how 24 changed the face of television!

Rodney also chats about his favourite moments working on 24, why the show ended, 24 the movie, twitter being shutdown at the 24 stages & what we can expect from the final episodes.

Another great insight in what goes on behind the scenes of your favourite show!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

24UKPodcast (Youtube)

item.title: Season 8 Episode 17 8am - 9am
item.description:
Another awesome episode of 24 followed by another awesome episode of your favourite podcast! We finally get to talk about the return of President Charles Logan and our exclusive video interview recorded in LA!

We delve into the 24 UK Podcast archive creating an unusually long intro discussing our old feature Logan die! We also discuss Gregory Itzin's car, Who's on Jack's List? & when will Chloe find that body in CTU?

All that plus the Line of Hour, Jack's losing kills & Conspiracy Theories! Be sure to check your subscription this week for Part 2 of our interviews with Rodney Charters & Marci Michelle.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Marci Michelle Interview Part 1
item.description:
Part 1 of our exclusive interview with the awesome Marci Michelle

In Part 1 of a 50 minute interview Marci talks about the 24 hockey game against House, working with Kiefer Sutherland, Jack's Dammit Count and much more!

Part 2 will be release this time next week!

item.title: Gregory Itzin (President Charles Logan) Interview (Part 4) in LA
item.description:
The final part of our exclusive interview with Gregory Itzin who plays President Charles Logan.

In Part 4 Greg reviews the 24 drink with Trig & Jamie, chats more about 24 and his upcoming projects.

Over 30 minutes of uninterrupted Itzin chat! Not to be missed!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Season 8 Episode 16 7am - 8am
item.description:
Join Trig & Jamie as they review episode 16 recorded the same night as episode 15! Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour & Conspiracy Theories!

Trig & Jamie also discuss women’s navigation skills, human evolution, Carlos Barbosa's assistant Amie and how to reload a pistol, plus much much more.


www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!
item.itunes:author: Trig and Jamie
item.itunes:subtitle: Join Trig & Jamie as they review episode 16 recorded the same night as episode 15! Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour & Conspiracy Theories! Trig & Jamie also discuss women’s navigation skills, human evolution, Carl
item.itunes:summary: Join Trig & Jamie as they review episode 16 recorded the same night as episode 15! Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour & Conspiracy Theories! Trig & Jamie also discuss women’s navigation skills, human evolution, Carlos Barbosa's assistant Amie and how to reload a pistol, plus much much more. www.24ukpodcast.net info@24ukpodcast.net @24UKPodcast Proudly sponsored by Blue Microphones!

item.title: Season 8 Episode 15 6am - 7am
item.description:
Welcome to another episode of the 24 UK Podcast with a difference! With the US showing a double episode Trig & Jamie have recorded episode 15 & then they watch episode 16 straight after recording their thoughts on a separate podcast!

What can you expect?

Teasers from our exclusive interviews with Gregory Itzin, Rodney Charters & Marci Michelle!

Dawn breaking in season 8, Jack falling asleep, Trig & Jamie being cut from episode 15 & their thoughts on Fox!

How to immoblise Jack Bauer, Dana using morse code & not sleeping with Jack! All that plus Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Jack's Dammit Count, Line of the Hour & Conspiracy Theories!

Straight after this podcast Trig & Jamie watch episode 16 & record their thoughts under a larger influence of alcohol!


www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

24UKPodcast (Youtube)

item.title: Gregory Itzin (President Charles Logan) Interview (Part 3) in LA
item.description:
Our exclusive interview with Gregory Itzin who of course plays President Charles Logan.

In this 4 part interview Greg talks about his return to 24 for Season 8, discusses whether Charles is still looking for Redemption or something more sinister & much much more!

Over 30 minutes of uninterrupted Itzin chat! Not to be missed!

www.24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

item.title: Season 8 Episode 14 5am - 6am
item.description:
All the latest interview news including an exclusive from LA, & 2 audio interviews on the way with Rodney Charters & Marci Michelle.

For the first time Trig & Jamie are joined by a special guest Chris. They talk fork lift truck drivers, repairing broken xbox’s and dead bodies rotting in CTU.

All that plus Trig's Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour, and possibly the most interesting Conspiracy Theories of the season!

Check your subscription throughout this week for the latest interviews.

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

24UKPodcast (YouTube feed)

item.title: Matthew Yang King (Agent King) Interview (Part 3) in LA
item.description:
The Final part of our exclusive interview with Matthew Yang King who plays Agent King in Season 8.

In Part 3 Matt talks 24 including more about Jon Cassar and Kiefer Sutherland, and tells Trig & Jamie how important Kiefer is to the show on and off screen.

This interview gives a great insight into behind the scenes of 24 and is not to be missed!

A HD version is available on our youtube feed.

www.24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

24UKPodcast (youtube)

info@24ukpodcast.net

item.title: Season 8 Episode 13 4am - 5am
item.description:
On Friday Trig & Jamie exclusively broke the news that 24 is sadly over! During a phone interview with the production designer Carlos Barbosa, Carlos revealed the sad news that 24 (the series) is over!

Listen in to the aftermath and of course episode 13 reviewed the only way you want it! Chloe is back on form, Kings death scene, the incredible Jenny Scott & Trig admits to picking the wrong Line of the Hour!

All that plus Jack's Kill Count, Jack's Dammit Count, and the Line of the Hour! Tune in this week for Part 3 of Matthew Yang Kings interview!

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

24UKPodcast (YouTube feed)

item.title: 24 is over!
item.description: Breaking news! You heard it here first! 24 Is unfortunately over. Here exclusive audio from Carlos Barbosa, recorded only minutes ago.

item.title: Matthew Yang King (Agent King) Interview (Part 1) in LA
item.description:
Join Trig & Jamie on their rooftop apartment in downtown LA for a fascinating interview with Matthew Yang King who plays Agent King in Season 8.

Over the course of this 4 part interview Matt talks about his role as Agent King & also shares some fascinating stories about Kiefer Sutherland & many offscreen events during his time on the set of 24.

This interview gives a great insight into behind the scenes of 24 and is not to be missed!

A HD version is available on our youtube feed.

www.24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (Twitter)

24UKPodcast (youtube)

info@24ukpodcast.net

item.title: Season 8 Episode 12 3am - 4am
item.description:
Welcome to another week of the 24 UK Podcast. We need your help to get Annie Wersching (Renee) on our show!

Trig & Jamie also chat about the latest interview news & discuss episode 12. Including the parole officer freely roaming CTU, CTU hit by an EMP Bomb! Hastings screaming security, and if Hastings is dead who will be the next head of CTU?

All that plus Trig rapping the headlines, Jamie winning the Kill Count, and Trig wining the Line of the Hour & much more!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.description:
Part 3 of our exclusive interview with Mido Hamada, Mido plays a Kamistani extremist in Season 8, and chats a little about his character Samir, season 8, and what he got up to on the set of 24.

Subscribe to our youtube feed to watch this interview in HD.

item.title: Season 8 Episode 10 & 11 1am - 3am
item.description:
After a week off Trig & Jamie bring you their thoughts on episode 10 & 11.

They discuss, Dana flirting with Arlo, Kiefer’s receding wig,
Kayla being very wet, Markos’ mother cleaning up her son with a mop, Darth Vader, and possibly the worst realtime continuity error in the history of 24!

All that plus Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour and Conspiracy Theories!

More video interviews this week & Remember to vote for your line of the hour on our forum.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.description: (Part 2) Trig & Jamie were invited into Jordan’s home for an exclusive interview, Jordan plays Dimitri in Season 8 and has interesting run in with one Jack Bauer.

item.title: Jon Cassar Interview (Part 4) in LA
item.description:
The final part of the 24 UK Podcast’s exclusive interview with former director and executive producer and huge fan of then show Jon Cassar.

They discuss Jon’s thoughts on Season 8, what he would have done differently, his favourite new character, how he sees 24 ending and much much more.

To watch this interview in HD head to our website or subscribe to our youtube feed.

A big thanks to Jon Cassar for meeting us in LA, it was one of the highlights of our trip! Subscribe to our youtube feed and please rate our videos. Parts 2-4 can be found on our youtube page.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.title: 2nd Teaser Trailer: Behind the scenes in LA
item.description:
Our 2nd and final teaser trailer of our time in LA. We took our cameras into CTU, the UN, on Location and anywhere where we could interview the 24 cast & crew. To see this trailer in HD head to our website.

A big thanks to Nawaz Alamgir for editing this trailer and to Guy Harris for voicing this trailer.

We have more video podcasts to follow soon, including our interview with Jon Cassar & Jordan Marder, these interviews have already been released on youtube in HD.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.title: LA Teaser Trailer: 24 UK Podcast
item.description:
The first of many video podcasts coming your way! After overwhelming requests we have decided to release compressed versions of our video interviews from LA.

If you want to watch the videos in HD then head to our website or subscribe to our youtube feed.

This teaser trailer shows just a glimpse of the awesome behind the scenes footage we will be releasing over the coming weeks, A big thanks to Nawaz Alamgir for editing this trailer and to Guy Harris for voicing this trailer.

Our 2nd trailer and interviews with Jon Cassar and Jordan Marder should be available to download over this week. They are already available on to watch on our website.

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

24ukpodcast (youtube)

If you want to watch the videos in HD then head to our website or subscribe to our youtube feed. This teaser trailer shows just a glimpse of the awesome behind the scenes footage we will be releasing over the coming weeks, A big thanks to Nawaz Alamgir for editing this trailer and to Guy Harris for voicing this trailer. Our 2nd trailer and interviews with Jon Cassar and Jordan Marder should be available to download over this week. They are already available on to watch on our website. www.24ukpodcast.net info@24ukpodcast.net @24UKPodcast 24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.title: 12am - 1am (Season 8)
item.description:
Episode 9 reviewed the only way, the 24 UK Podcast way. We have Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour and Conspiracy Theories.

Plus Trig & Jamie discuss Tony breaking out of jail, Jamie's middle eastern accent, Farhard and Samir's facial hair, Renee's one tear & is Jack falling for Renee? And much more!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

item.title: 11pm - 12am (Season 8)
item.description:
Another week and another episode of the hit 24 UK Podcast. Our video interview with Jon Cassar is coming your way on youtube subscribe now!

This week Trig & Jamie discuss Hassan losing the plot, their love for Kevin and Nick, why moles work hard, And Jack Bauer is back!


Also tune in for Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour, and Trig & Jamie's Conspiracy Theories.

Thanks to our sponsor Blue Microphone for providing us with the awesome Yeti Microphone!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast

item.title: 10pm - 11pm (Season 8)
item.description:
Tune in this week to hear special 24 UK Podcast news from their trip in LA!

And of course Trig & Jamie review episode 7 and discuss Dana and Cole’s wedding, water pistols, how to cut bread & maybe Hastings isn't to bad after-all?

All that plus the usual features, Jack's Kill Count, Line of the Hour & Conspiracy Theories.

Tune in on Friday for our first interview from LA!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

@24UKPodcast (twitter)

24ukpodcast (youtube)

item.title: 8pm - 10pm (Season 8)
item.description:
Recorded back in the 24 UK Podcast’s UK Studio

Trig & Jamie discuss their final few days in LA and what you can expect over the next few weeks.

Plus much more including Jack talking German, Renee in the shower, Dana living at CTU, and Cole Ortiz the best head of field ops?

Head over to our forum to submit you Line of the Hour & predict Jack's Kill Count!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net

item.title: 6pm - 8pm (Season 8)
item.description:
This podcast comes directly to you earlier than usual. Why? Well because we're operating on LA time of course!

Recorded from our Los Angeles studios, catch up on all that Trig & Jamie have been up to since embarking upon their tour. Not only that, but we're also giving you a complete review of episodes 3 & 4 of 24 season 8.

Helipads, Rainbow, Repunzel, tramps, Trig's writers strike and even some stuff about 24.

item.title: 4pm - 6pm (Season 8)
item.description:
We're Back! Join Trig & Jamie as they record the podcast live for the first time before flying out to LA!

Episodes 1 & 2 reviewed for you listening pleasure! It's all there Headlines, Jack's Kill Count, Conspiracy Theories & the most talked about feature since Jack's Dammit Count Line of the Hour!


Head over to our forum to submit you Line of the Hour & predict Jack's Kill Count!

www.24ukpodcast.net

info@24ukpodcast.net
